Power menu controls 3.0
Version 1.0 # Initial release Version 2.0
# Add screenshot\n # Add bluetooth toggle\n # Add split screen\n # Add Paytm QR scan for Indian users\n # [Root needed] Add NFC toggle\n # [Root needed] Add Data toggle\n # Add Message center for important announcements.\n # Add Preferences screen\n # Link to XDA page\n # [Bug fix] App crash on Total silence in DND\n # [Bug fix] Ringtone not muting\n # Link added to help with translations\n # Turn off wakelock if manually screen is locked. Can be disabled from preference screen.\n # Update status when changed from long pressing the control\n
Version 3.0
# Added translations.\n # [Bug fix] Hopefully fix battery stat control\n # Show warning message to Xiaomi MIUI and Samsung One UI users.\n # Battery control now fills up to how much battery is left.\n # Long press WakeLock tile for bright/dim wakelock.\n # Long press WakeLock tile for auto-timeout wakelock.\n # New Page editor for control tiles across multiple pages.\n # New tile to change keyboard.\n # New tile to open Shazam to search for music.\n # [Root needed] New tile to kill the currently open app.\n

Generic control Generic control description
WakeLock ON WakeLock OFF Bright Dim WakeLock types Bright: Screen will stay fully lit up (Not recommended) Dim: Screen will dim brightness after some time. Wakelock time Automatically release wake lock after this time.\n Set to Manual to keep screen on forever unless manually turned off. 5 min 10 min 30 min Manual
Launcher app not killed Cannot kill self :) Killed Failed to kill. Could not Shazam.
Modify system permission needed. Click \"Proceed\" to open settings and grant permission. Overlay permission needed. Click \"Proceed\" to grant permission to draw over other apps. Battery service may be inaccurate. Battery percentages, battery saver state, charging state shown by the control may not be correct for all devices from all manufacturers.\n\n This control cannot toggle battery savings mode. Please long press on it to open settings and toggle it.\n\n Click \"Proceed\" to enable this toggle. Proceed Your opinion is important If this app has helped you, please consider giving a rating and/or a review. Sure Thank you! Quick apps The apps listed below belong to the respective organizations/developers.\nThese apps maybe removed in future if requested by the app developers or Google.\n
Enable accessibility service. Without this permission, the app screen is blocked.\n\nClick \"Proceed\" to open settings and grant permission. Paytm app is not installed. Shazam app is not installed. Kindly install from Google Play Store.
Without this permission, cannot send request to system to capture screen. We can only request split screen with this permission. Accessibility service is needed to close the power menu. Root options Useful for people with rooted devices.\nIf you are NOT rooted, many of the below options can be long pressed in power menu for further options. Root not available or permission denied! You can long press the NFC control to open settings and manually toggle NFC. You can long press the Data control to open Data usage page and manually turn it on. Accessibility permission is needed to close power menu and detect the current app. Root is necessary, this option cannot run without root. New message received! View May not work on Samsung One UI. Sorry! 😢
Because of software modifications by Samsung, this app may not work correctly.\n\n It may (or may not) work on One UI above version 3.1. You may get the controls from notification shade (Media and Devices) and not power menu.\n\n The app may also work fine on all custom ROMs.\n\n Please understand this is not a fault of this app. 😭
May not work on Xiaomi MIUI. Sorry! 😢
Because of software modifications by Xiaomi, this app may not work correctly.\n\n It may (or may not) work on MIUI above version 12. You may get the controls from notification shade and not power menu.\n\n The app may also work fine on all custom ROMs.\n\n Please understand this is not a fault of this app. 😭
Permissions Can modify settings Can draw over apps Accessibility granted
Tap anywhere to dismiss, or use Back button / gesture.

Skip Finish Next Previous
Hello! This is a short tour on how to use this app! Click next to proceed. Or skip to close this tutorial. You can always watch this later.
Step 1: Select the controls In the main screen of the app, select the controls you need
Step 2: Add to power menu 1. Long press power button. If you have never added a control before, click the highlighted blue box area Then go to Step 4. If some controls are already present: 2. Click the 3 dot menu. 3. Click "Add controls"
Step 3: Add to power menu Click Other apps This screen will only appear if you already have added some controls to power menu before installing this app. Else proceed to next step.
Step 4: Enable controls 1. Click this app name 2. Check the boxes of the controls. 3. Finally, click Save.
Done! You can now go back to home screen. If you long press power menu, you should see the controls.
Made with Android Studio\ Version:
Comma not allowed. Default page Same page exists.
Duplicate page names not allowed.
Edit Pages Save What is this?
Does not immediately change the page. The system does not immediately pick up the change of page.\n - Try opening and closing the power menu multiple times.\n - If that does not work, try restarting the device. Don\'t show again
What is a \"Page\"? \"Page\" is a group of controls under a custom name. Here are two controls set with a Page named \"Sounds\". In the power menu, it is shown under a separate drop-down named \"Sounds\", and not with all other controls. How to add a page? To add a page, click the \"Edit Pages\" button at the bottom. Then click the plus sign, add a page name. Names of previously created pages can also be edited by simply clicking on the text. Click the red dustbin to delete a page. The \"Default page\" cannot be edited. Then for the needed control, click the drop-down and select the Page. Finally click the \"Save\" button at the bottom.
